verses.roman:
ati gūḍha hetu sei tri-vidha prakāra
dāmodara-svarūpa haite yāhāra pracāra

synonyms: ati—very; gūḍha—esoteric; hetu—reason; sei—that; tri-vidha—three; prakāra—kinds; dāmodara-svarūpa haite—from Svarūpa Dāmodara; yāhāra—of which; pracāra—the proclamation.
translation: That most confidential cause is threefold. Svarūpa Dāmodara has revealed it.
